title: Urgent opening For Sales Manager role at Homebazaar.com @Vashi/Andheri
tagsAndSkills: sales,Target Achievement,Hospitality Sales,B2C Sales,Property Sales,Direct Sales,Insurance Sales,Event Sales
jobDescription:
Greetings from Homebazaar.com


Who are we?

"Home Bazaar Services Pvt Ltd is India's leading Property Advisor with an immense history of successful client satisfaction. With 11+ years of expertise, we analyze and cater to the client's requirements and have assisted thoroughly in their property buying journey. With the support of 350+ Property experts, we have been awarded Mumbai's best-winning property service company for the Quarter 2022 -23. With these achievements under our wings, we also have expanded to new horizons, we are currently operational in 9+ metro cities across India."


What is our requirement?

Role: Sales Manager/ Sr. Sales Manager

Job Location : Vashi/ Lower Parel/ Andheri

Experience : 2 Year to 12 Years


Responsibilities

  • Be responsible for Residential Real Estate Sales in Mumbai achieve monthly revenue targets.
  • Be responsible for end to end discussion with buyers and educate them about company's offerings on every day basis.
  • Responsible for Attend inquires generated through the Digital Marketing platform by addressing need & concerns to fulfil buyer's expectations.
  • Develop relationships with Top Selling Developer and Investors and End-customers.
  • Intermediate negotiation processes, consult clients on market conditions, prices.
  • Provide advisory/consultation to customers for purchasing property for the best deal under the best terms.
  • Understand clients' needs and propose solutions that suit them best.
  • Fixing up an Engagement Meetings with the Predetermined Leads. Showing, consulting, and selling by giving excellent personalized service to the HNI customers.
  • Converting prospects into buyer by show-casing appropriate primary residential properties to them, matching the investment need of the prospects.
  • Perform comparative market analysis to estimate properties value.
  • Work closely with internal CRM team to ensure hassle free after sales service
  • Build trust, value others , communicate effectively, drive execution, foster innovation, focus on the customer, collaborate with others, solve problems creatively and demonstrate high integrity.

Why Join Us?

  • Excellent Inputs & Real Time Support given by management to achieve realistic targets
  • Pre-generated quality leads provided by the Homebazaar.com
  • Professional development & career advancement opportunities within the Homebazaar.com
  • Young & Vibrant work Culture.
  • Reimbursement of fixed travelling & actual mobile expenses.

SKILLS REQUIRED:

  • Candidate should be aggressive in Sales.
  • Must be presentable.
  • Good/excellent experience in handling HNI Clients/Customers.
  • Should have a positive attitude & should be confident to accept new challenges.
  • Must own a bike/car with valid license & papers for the vehicle.
  • Should have a focused mind-set for Hardcore sales profile.

What we give you?

Fixed Salary + Monthly Incentives+ Quarterly Increment(Performance Based)


How to Apply?

Kindly share your resume on trupti.zinge@homebazaar.com and for more details contact on 88281 13857

title: Design Draughtsman
tagsAndSkills: Solid Works,welding joints,AutoCAD,Pro-E,3D Modeling,welding symbol,Design,Welding
jobDescription:
Job Description:


We are looking for a skilled CAD Draftsman to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for creating detailed technical drawings and plans using CAD software. You will work closely with our engineering and design teams to develop precise and accurate drawings that meet our clients' specifications.


Key Responsibilities:


  • Develop and prepare detailed drawings in CAD based on specifications provided by engineers and designers.
  • Modify existing drawings as required and ensure all designs are accurate and up to date.
  • Collaborate with engineering and design teams to ensure that drawings meet project requirements.
  • Review and analyse sketches, notes, and other input materials to accurately produce CAD drawings.
  • Maintain organized project files, including all associated documentation and revisions.
  • Ensure that all drawings comply with company standards and industry regulations.

Key Requirements:


  • Proficiency in CAD software (e.g., AutoCAD, SolidWorks, or similar).
  • Good knowledge of welding symbol, welding joints, etc.
  • Good knowledge of machine components & tolerances
  • Strong understanding of drafting standards and best practices.
  • Ability to interpret engineering sketches and design documents.
  • Good communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively with engineering and design teams.
  • Detail oriented with a focus on accuracy and precision in all work.
  • 2+ years of experience in a CAD drafting role, preferably in the Equipment Manufacturing Industry sector.
  • Familiarity with industry specific codes and standards is a plus.

Preferred Qualifications:


  • Minimum Qualification Required: ITI, NCTVT, Diploma in Mechanical Engineering
  • Experience with 3D modelling and simulation software like SolidWorks, AutoCAD
  • Certification in CAD software or drafting technology preferred

title: AVP HR &TA
tagsAndSkills: DIgital banking,HRBP,Fintech,TA,Hrsd,Digital,Avp
jobDescription:
Job Title: Human Resources Business Partner (HRBP) - Talent Acquisition (TA)
Location: Seawoods , Navi Mumbai
Department: Human Resources

Job Summary:

The HR Business Partner (HRBP) specializing in Talent Acquisition for Digital Banking will work closely with the HR team and digital banking business leaders to drive strategic talent acquisition initiatives. This role is responsible for developing and implementing effective recruitment strategies to attract top talent in the digital banking space, ensuring alignment with the organizations goals and culture. The HRBP will also provide expertise in talent management, employee relations, and organizational development to support the growth and success of the digital banking division.

Key Responsibilities:

  1. Talent Acquisition:
    • Develop and execute recruitment strategies to attract top talent for the digital banking division.
    • Partner with hiring managers to understand staffing needs and create job descriptions that align with business objectives.
    • Manage the end-to-end recruitment process, including sourcing, interviewing, and onboarding.
    • Build and maintain a strong talent pipeline through networking, direct sourcing, and partnerships with external organizations.
  2. Business Partnering:
    • Act as a strategic partner to digital banking leaders, understanding their business needs and providing HR guidance.
    • Collaborate with leadership to identify and address workforce challenges and opportunities.
    • Provide counsel on HR policies, procedures, and best practices to support a positive and productive work environment.
  3. Employee Relations:
    • Serve as a trusted advisor on employee relations issues, providing guidance and support to managers and employees.
    • Investigate and resolve employee concerns and conflicts in a timely and effective manner.
    • Promote a positive organizational culture by fostering open communication and feedback.
  4. Talent Management:
    • Support the implementation of talent management programs, including performance management, succession planning, and career development.
    • Identify high-potential employees and create development plans to enhance their skills and capabilities.
    • Drive initiatives to enhance employee engagement, retention, and satisfaction.
  5. Organizational Development:
    • Collaborate with the HR team to develop and implement initiatives that support organizational growth and change.
    • Assist in the design and delivery of training and development programs to enhance employee skills and knowledge.
    • Support change management efforts to ensure smooth transitions during organizational changes.
  6. Compliance and Reporting:
    • Ensure compliance with all relevant employment laws and regulations.
    • Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of recruitment and HR activities.
    • Prepare and analyze HR metrics and reports to inform decision-making and strategy development.

Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field.
  • 5+ years of experience in HR, with a focus on talent acquisition and business partnering.
  • Experience in digital banking or financial services is highly preferred.
  • Strong knowledge of HR best practices, employment laws, and regulations.
  • Excellent communication, interpersonal, and negotiation skills.
  • Proven ability to build relationships and work collaboratively with stakeholders at all levels.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Proficiency in HRIS and talent acquisition tools.

Preferred Skills:

  • Experience in digital transformation initiatives within a financial institution.
  • Certification in HR (e.g., SHRM-CP, SHRM-SCP, PHR, SPHR).
  • Familiarity with diversity and inclusion strategies and programs.

Why Join Us?

  • Opportunity to be part of a dynamic and innovative digital banking team.
  • Work in a collaborative and inclusive environment.
  • Competitive compensation and benefits package.
  • Career growth and development opportunities.

title: Business Development Executive
tagsAndSkills: Business Development,B2B Marketing,Business Development And Marketing,Sales And Marketing,New Business Development,Sales Lead Generation,Sales Development,B2B Sales
jobDescription:
Role & responsibilities


JOB Profile :

-create leads, contact and coordinate with potential clients.

- Prospect and qualify potential clients interested in digital marketing, website development, and other IT solution services.

- Conduct thorough needs analysis and propose tailored solutions that meet client objectives.

- Present and demonstrate our digital marketing strategies, website design capabilities, and IT Solutions expertise to prospects.

- Negotiate contracts, terms, and pricing with clients to achieve sales targets and profitability goals.

- Collaborate with our technical and creative teams to create proposals and project plans that align with client needs and expectations.

- Maintain strong relationships with existing clients and upsell additional services as opportunities arise.

- Stay updated on industry trends and market conditions to provide strategic insights and recommendations to clients.




Preferred candidate profile :

Proven 3-8 years of experience in sales, preferably in digital marketing, website development, or app development industry

- Strong understanding of digital marketing sales strategies, website development sales.

- Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills.

- Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced, entrepreneurial environment.

- Goal-oriented with a track record of meeting and exceeding sales targets.

- Science or Commerce Graduate OR Bachelors degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field is preferred.

- Experience using computers and proficiency in MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) & Google sheet.

The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of digital marketing trends, website development technologies. They should also possess excellent communication skills, a proven track record in sales, and the ability to build relationships with clients.


Job Type: Full-time

Experience:

  • Business development: 2 years (Required)
  • Digital marketing: 2 years (Required)
  • B2B Marketing: 2 years (Required)

Perks and benefits -As per Industry standard

title: Sr Ticketing Consultant Counter Staff
tagsAndSkills: Ticketing,Travel Agency,Domestic Ticketing,GDS,Air Ticketing,Travel Desk,IATA,Ticket Booking

ambitionBoxData.Title: Seventh Sky Tours and Travels Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
Seventh Sky Tours and Travels, a well-established company with 15 years of experience in the travel industry and accredited by IATA, is seeking a highly skilled professional to join our team.




Roles and Responsibilities

As a member of our team, the candidate will be responsible for handling both domestic and international ticketing desks. This role demands a professional with excellent communication skills and a strong ability to manage all ticketing queries efficiently.



Key responsibilities include:

  • Flight Booking: Handle flight reservations for customers, including providing options for different routes, airlines, and schedules.
  • Ticketing: Issue tickets accurately and efficiently, ensuring adherence to airline policies and regulations.
  • Customer Service: Provide excellent customer service by addressing inquiries, resolving issues, and assisting with special requests.
  • Fare Calculation: Calculate fares based on routing, class of service, and applicable fees, while ensuring accuracy and compliance with company policies.
  • Itinerary Management: Prepare and distribute travel itineraries to customers, including details such as flight times, layovers, and contact information.
  • Documentation: Ensure all necessary travel documents, such as visas and passports, are valid and in order before issuing tickets.
  • Collaboration: Coordinate with other departments, such as sales and operations, to ensure seamless customer service and resolve any issues that may arise.
  • Reporting: Maintain accurate records of bookings, transactions, and customer interactions for reporting and analysis purposes.
  • Stay Informed: Keep abreast of industry trends, airline policies, and changes in regulations to provide up-to-date information to customers.
  • Upselling: Identify opportunities to upsell additional services such as travel insurance, seat upgrades, or hotel accommodations to enhance the customer's travel experience.


Qualifications:

  • Education: Minimum of a 12th-grade education.
  • Experience: Prior experience in airline ticketing, travel agency, or related industry preferred.
  • Computer Skills: Proficiency in using airline reservation systems (e.g., Amadeus, Sabre, Galileo) and Microsoft Office suite.
  • Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English and any additional languages are advantageous.
  • Attention to Detail: Strong attention to detail to ensure accuracy in ticketing and documentation.
  • Customer Focus: Ability to prioritize customer needs and deliver high-quality service in a fast-paced environment.
  • Problem-Solving Skills: Ability to quickly identify and resolve issues to ensure customer satisfaction.
  • Adaptability: Flexibility to adapt to changing schedules, priorities, and customer demands.
  • Team Player: Ability to collaborate effectively with colleagues and other departments to achieve common goals.
  • Professionalism: Maintain a professional demeanor and uphold ethical standards in all interactions with customers and colleagues.


We are looking for a candidate who not only meets the technical requirements but also brings a passion for travel and a dedication to providing excellent customer service. Join us at Seventh Sky Tours and Travels to help our clients experience the world like never before.
